import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import HistoryAPI from "../../API/HistoryAPI"; function DetailHistory(props) { const { id } = useParams(); console.log("xin chai", id); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const [information, setInformation] = useState({}); console.log('xin chao') useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await HistoryAPI.getDetail(id); console.log(response); setCart(response); setInformation(response); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (

Detail Order

ID User: {information.idUser}

Full Name: {information.fullname}

Phone: {information.phone}

Address: {information.address}

Total: {information.total}$

{cart._id}
{cart.user.fullName}
{value.priceProduct}

); } export default DetailHistory;
